[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″ row_name=”hero-section” el_class=”our-mission”][vc_column column_width_percent=”85″ align_horizontal=”align_center” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ medium_width=”7″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″ css=”.vc_custom_1487795365318{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″ medium_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_empty_space empty_h=”3″ desktop_visibility=”yes” mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_custom_heading auto_text=”yes” heading_semantic=”h5″ text_size=”h5″ text_space=”fontspace-135905″ text_font=”font-208139″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”accent” css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”100″ el_class=”parallax-header”]

Our Mission

[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-524109″ text_font=”font-156269″ text_weight=”100″ text_color=”color-prif” mobile_visibility=”yes” css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″]Mondo is the largest national staffing agency specializing exclusively in high-end, niche IT, Tech, Creative and Digital Marketing talent. Finding great talent is possible. We provide best-in-class talent at unmatched speed with unparalleled collaboration. It’s business solutions through people because we know it’s not about what you do; it’s about who you have. Together, we partner to close your Tech talent gap.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_raw_html]JTNDYSUyMGhyZWYlM0QlMjIlMkZjdWx0dXJlJTIyJTNFJTBBJTNDZGl2JTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJjdGElMjIlM0UlMEElMjAlMjBMZWFybiUyME1vcmUlMEElMjAlMjAlM0NzcGFuJTIwY2xhc3MlM0QlMjJBZnRlckhvdmVyJTIyJTNFJTNDJTJGc3BhbiUzRSUwQSUzQyUyRmRpdiUzRSUwQSUzQyUyRmElM0U=[/vc_raw_html][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row row_height_percent=”0″ back_color=”color-prif” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″ css=”.vc_custom_1545815565893{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}” el_class=”our-services-section”][vc_column column_width_percent=”100″ position_vertical=”middle” overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”2″ medium_width=”0″ shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_fixed=”yes” z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ gutter_size=”3″ shift_y=”0″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”100″ align_horizontal=”align_right” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”50″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”0″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”0″ shift_y=”0″ shift_y_fixed=”yes” z_index=”0″ width=”1/1″][vc_empty_space empty_h=”2″ mobile_visibility=”yes” el_class=”before-services-space”][vc_custom_heading text_color=”color-gyho” css_animation=”alpha-anim” animation_speed=”100″ el_class=”x-large-heading-services scroll-slow”]

services

[/vc_custom_heading][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space empty_h=”5″ mobile_visibility=”yes”][vc_row_inner row_inner_height_percent=”0″ overlay_alpha=”50″ equal_height=”yes” gutter_size=”4″ shift_y=”0″][vc_column_inner column_width_percent=”80″ position_vertical=”middle” gutter_size=”3″ overlay_alpha=”49″ align_medium=”align_center_tablet” medium_width=”7″ align_mobile=”align_center_mobile” shift_x=”3″ shift_y=”0″ z_index=”0″ css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″ width=”4/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1487795492805{padding-right: 45px !important;padding-left: 45px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading auto_text=”yes” heading_semantic=”h5″ text_size=”h5″ text_space=”fontspace-135905″ text_font=”font-208139″ text_weight=”100″ text_transform=”uppercase” text_color=”accent” el_class=”parallax-header”]

Our Services

[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”div” text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-524109″ text_font=”font-148806″ text_weight=”100″ text_color=”color-gyho” mobile_visibility=”yes” css_animation=”alpha-anim”]Tech, Creative, & Digital, in their many forms, are our areas of expertise. With nearly two decades of IT staffing, Creative staffing, and Digital Marketing staffing experience and 10 offices nationwide, your urgent hiring needs are in good hands when you partner with us. We have the high-end Creative & Digital Marketing professionals with the creativity and digital expertise you’re missing and the niche Tech talent you need to drive innovation and crush competitors. Whether you’re looking for contract, freelance, contract-to-hire, or full-time talent or work, we’ve got you covered.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_custom_heading heading_semantic=”h1″ text_size=”h3″ text_height=”fontheight-524109″ text_font=”font-156269″ text_weight=”100″ text_color=”color-prif” desktop_visibility=”yes” medium_visibility=”yes” css_animation=”bottom-t-top” animation_delay=”200″ el_class=”.our-services-text-mobile”]Tech & Digital Marketing: contract, freelance, C2H, & full-time talent available. We’ve got your hiring needs covered.[/vc_custom_heading][vc_raw_html]JTNDYSUyMGhyZWYlM0QlMjIlMkZzZXJ2aWNlcyUyMiUzRSUwQSUzQ2RpdiUyMGNsYXNzJTNEJTIyY3RhLWxpZ2h0JTIyJTNFJTBBJTIwJTIwRXhwbG9yZSUyMG5vdyUwQSUyMCUyMCUzQ3NwYW4lMjBjbGFzcyUzRCUyMkFmdGVySG92ZXItbGlnaHQlMjIlM0UlM0MlMkZzcGFuJTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGZGl2JTNFJTBBJTNDJTJGYSUzRQ==[/vc_raw_html][vc_empty_space <meta name="description" content="Mondo is the largest national staffing agency specializing exclusively in high-end, niche IT, Tech, Creative, & Digital Marketing talent." />
